name: ESM Site Manager
description: Maintains site information and accesses site tools and SMT for Ecosystem Services Monitoring (ESM) sites

name: Notify Endangered Species Access
description: Gets email when there are new requests for endangered species access

name: Technical Coordinator
description: Facilitates use of TEAM tools and accesses most tools for all sites

name: Regional Manager
description: For email notifications

name: Approves Reports (MBG)
description: Approves new Drupal MBG reports

name: Approves Endangered Species Access
description: Approves requests for data about endangered species

name: Approves Reports for Publication
description: Approves all reports for Drupal publication

name: Technical Director
description: Supervises use of TEAM tools and accesses most tools for all sites

name: Approves Comments
description: Approves comments on Drupal pages

name: Notify Report Created
description: Gets email when new Drupal report created (e.g. CI quarterly reports)

name: Approves Reports (CTFS)
description: Approves new Drupal CTFS reports

name: Network Spatial Expert
description: Defines spatial data for DQA

name: Approves Institutions
description: Approves new institutions for institutions_team table used in site config and user profiles

name: Approves Sampling Schedule
description: Approves proposed sampling schedules

name: Approves Reports (CI)
description: Approves new Drupal CI reports

name: Approves Reports (WCS)
description: Approves new Drupal WCS reports

name: Approves Publications
description: Approves new publications for TEAM Drupal bibliography

name: Approves News and Events
description: Approves new news and events content for Drupal

name: Web Master
description: Controls Drupal site

name: Steering Committee
description: To display Steering Committee members in Network Member listings

name: Administrative Liaison
description: To display Administrative Liaisons in Network Member listings

name: Page Editors
description: Edit Drupal page content

name: Data Reviewer Admin
description: Admins DQA data

name: wpi_sme_user
description: Wildlife Picture Index (WPI) Subject Matter Expert (SME) User

name: wpi_admin_user
description: Wildlife Picture Index (WPI) Admin User

name: View Dashboard
description: Accesses dashboard

name: IT Specialist
description: To display IT Specialists in Network Member listings

name: Notify Report Published
description: Gets email when Drupal report made public (e.g. CI quarterly report)

name: wpi_registered_user
description: Wildlife Picture Index (WPI) Registered User

name: Taxonomic App Admin
description: Administrator for the taxonomic web application

name: Data Download Stats
description: Sees more columns in Gridsphere data download stats

name: Sampling Schedule Admin
description: Admins sampling scheduler

name: Institutional Representative
description: Represents TEAM partner at a higher level than Site Manager and has the same site access as a Site Manager

name: Data Registration
description: Accesses legacy metacat application linked from myTEAM

name: Taxonomic App Expert
description: Expert editor for the taxonomic web application

name: Science Advisory Board
description: To display Science Advisory Board members in Network Member listings

name: Download Endangered Species
description: Registered users who are approved to download endangered species data

name: Upload Data - D.C.
description: Uploads data to D.C. - legacy role

name: Coordinating Unit
description: TEAM CI staff

name: Technical Liaison
description: Accesses most TEAM tools for specific sites

name: Upload Data - Brazil
description: Uploads data to Brazil - legacy role

name: Hide in Directory
description: Users with special permissions (like siteadmin) that we want to hide in Drupal network member listing

name: Site Manager
description: Maintains site information and accesses site tools and SMT

name: Taxonomic Expert
description: Clean up protocol data using the data management tool

name: Data Editor
description: Edits saved data

name: Data Reviewer
description: Comments or adds notes to data

name: Sampling Scheduler
description: Creates sampling schedules

name: Spatial Data Expert
description: Uploads Shapefiles for designing the spatial locations of sampling units; Uploads GPX files for the GPS locations of sampling units

name: Data Uploader
description: Uploads and saves new data

name: Data Collector
description: Collects and uploads new data

name: Network Member
description: Accesses TEAM tools

name: authenticated user
description: User is logged into Drupal
